name: General Tawaret

specials.name: Sacrilegious Aura
specials.description: 30 feet. When a creature in the aura uses a positive spell or ability, General Tawaret automatically attempts to counteract it, with a +26 counteract modifier.

specials.name: Devastating Blast
specials.description: General Tawaret unleashes a 30-foot cone of energy. Creatures in the area take 10d12 cold damage (DC 40 basic Reflex save). General Tawaret can use this ability once every 1d4 rounds.

specials.name: Graveknight's Curse
specials.description: This curse affects anyone who wears a graveknight’s armor for at least 1 hour. Saving Throw DC 42 Will save; Onset 1 hour; Stage 1 doomed 1 and cannot remove the armor (1 day); Stage 2 doomed 2, hampered 10, and cannot remove the armor (1 day); Stage 3 dies and transforms into the armor’s graveknight.

specials.name: Weapon Master
specials.description: General Tawaret has access to the critical specialization effects of any weapons she wields.

specials.name: Chariot of the Conqueror
specials.description: Vehicle 15 Unique / Large Price 13,000 gp This fantastic vehicle was fashioned specifically for General Tawaret, who rode it into battle throughout her military career. The chariot is pulled by a team of two ghostly manticores controlled by beaded reigns. Space 5 feet long, 10 feet wide, 4 feet high Crew 1 pilot (see Ghost Ride), 1 passenger Piloting Check Driving Lore (DC 34) or Arcana or Nature (DC 36 to command the ghostly manticores) AC 31; Fort +25 Hardness 20, HP 250 (BT 125); Immunities critical hits, object immunities, precision damage Speed 150 feet, fly 150 feet (pulled by two ghostly manticores) Collision 9d10 (DC 34) Ghost Ride (A) (concentrate, verbal); Frequency once per day; Duration 1 hour; Effect The ghostly manticores pilot the chariot based on the verbal commands from the pilot (no action required). The manticores have a +22 bonus to their Piloting Lore check. Ghostly Manticores The chariot is pulled by two ghostly manticores. They share the statistics of the chariot and can take no other action but to pull the chariot. All-Terrain The chariot ignores difficult terrain and is under the effects of a permanent arcane water walk spell.

items: +2 greater resilient full plate, +2 greater striking keen shock greatsword, belt of regeneration, +2 greater striking composite longbow, x2 javelins of lightning, greater starshot arrow, lightning rod shot, moderate black tendril shot, chariot of the conqueror (see below)
